item.title: Text editors: which is the best?
item.description: Text editors are probably the most basic tool of every software developer, without them we would not be able to do our jobs. It makes sense then to try and find out what the best text editor is, doesn’t it? Is it Vim? Is it Emacs? Is it another? It’s important to first look at what we want in a text editor before we are able to answer this.
